files.patch:
@@ -110,0 +110,8 @@ + + /** + * Set to {@code true} for {@code BuiltInProfile}, {@code false} otherwise. + * This check is used in {@link #setData(int, byte[])} to prevent modifying + * built-in profiles. + */ + private final transient boolean builtIn; + @@ -119,0 +127,2 @@ + * ProfileDeferralInfo is used for only built-in profile creation and + * all built-in profiles should be constructed using it. @@ -766,0 +776,1 @@ + builtIn = false; @@ -771,0 +782,4 @@ + * + *

+ * Note: {@code ProfileDeferralInfo} is used for only built-in profile + * creation and all built-in profiles should be constructed using it. @@ -774,0 +789,1 @@ + builtIn = true; @@ -1134,0 +1150,9 @@ + *

+ * Note: JDK built-in ICC Profiles cannot be updated using this method + * as it will result in {@code IllegalArgumentException}. JDK built-in + * profiles are those obtained by {@code ICC_Profile.getInstance(int colorSpaceID)} + * where {@code colorSpaceID} is one of the following: + * {@link ColorSpace#CS_sRGB}, {@link ColorSpace#CS_LINEAR_RGB}, + * {@link ColorSpace#CS_PYCC}, {@link ColorSpace#CS_GRAY} or + * {@link ColorSpace#CS_CIEXYZ}. + * @@ -1139,1 +1164,1 @@ - * @throws IllegalArgumentException if a content of the {@code tagData} + * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the content of the {@code tagData} @@ -1142,0 +1167,3 @@ + * @throws IllegalArgumentException if this is a built-in profile for one + * of the pre-defined color spaces, that is those which can be obtained + * by calling {@code ICC_Profile.getInstance(int colorSpaceID)} @@ -1143,0 +1171,1 @@ + * @see ColorSpace @@ -1145,0 +1174,4 @@ + if (builtIn) { + throw new IllegalArgumentException("Built-in profile cannot be modified"); + } +
